bgm.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 65 Farewell, My Friend

parameters: \n<\N[8]>I don't want to see you right now.
\n<\N[4]>Why were you yelling at grandad again?
\n<\N[8]>Just reading and writing, like I normally do.
\n<\N[4]>Mum there's something I need to tell you.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 06 Wake Up

parameters: \n<\N[8]>Look, grandad will take care of me.
\n<\N[8]>Once he gets off my back about dumb farm work.
\n<\N[4]>I'll be back as quick as I can.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 65 Farewell, My Friend

parameters: \n<\N[4]>GET YOUR NASTY PAWS OFF MY MUM!
\n<\N[11]>I'm sorry to have invaded in your personal matters.
\n<\N[11]>But I must confess I was simply overwhelmed.
\n<\N[11]>Many years ago, while I was a mere squire I was enchanted by your mother.
\n<\N[8]>Back then I was still working with dad, selling food in \C[25]Civitatem\C[0].
\n<\N[11]>When she awoke I explained the entire situation, and we could not help but reminisce.
\n<\N[8]>I was very lonely at that time.
\n<\N[8]>Said, "it helps to keep your mind focused".
\n<\N[8]>And I did focus...\| but not for his sake.
\n<\N[8]>I just focused on what really matters to me.
\n<\N[4]>We'll destory the \C[10]Ice Lord\C[0], and get everything back to normal.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 65 Farewell, My Friend

parameters: \n<\N[11]>I fear she is not long for this world.
\n<\N[11]>Before we left this valley, we searched the remains of the \C[25]Ice Volcano\C[0] only to discover this.
\n<\N[11]>The royal seal is completely different, and with \C[13]Griffin's\C[0] odd behaviour.
\n<\N[11]>Several of my men hurried to protect this village, only to have to fight off our former comrades.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 69 One Last Try

parameters: \n<\N[11]>There is nothing I can say, that will make this any better.
\n<\N[11]>However, I pledge to assit all of you in relocating to \C[25]Civitatem\C[0], if you wish.
\n<\N[1]>We all have our own path to walk.
\n<\N[1]>With your help we can walk that path.
\n<\N[2]>\C[25]Civitatem\C[0] has the best magic schools but.
\n<\N[6]>He needs his family now, more then ever.
\n<\N[4]>Even in the darkest times, as long as you still have your friends and family there's always light at the end of the tunnel.
\n<\N[8]>\C[13]Cherry\C[0]\|, make sure \C[13]Cloudo\C[0] doesnt climb any trees like.
\n<\N[8]>Did you know the greatest writers get their best ideas when theyre sick.
\n<\N[8]>Nothing left to do, but think all day.
\n<\N[8]>I think I'll title my next story "The Wonder Boy".
\n<\N[8]>You know, after my first story gets published.
\n<\N[8]>I'm feelin a little woozy, I might just get back to sleep.
\n<\N[8]>Being a father what a ridiculous idea.
\n<\N[8]>I am dedicated to serving my Lord.
\n<\N[7]>I'm too old, I would have been killed.
\n<\N[7]>Theres so much I need to tell \C[13]Lily\C[0].
\n<\N[7]>When the \C[10]Monsters\C[0] attacked we just ran to \C[13]Lily\C[0].
\n<\N[7]>\C[13]Lily\C[0] will get through this though, won't she.
A random assortment of letters, and parchments that read \fi"Story ideas"\fi.
